about_the_game:
The Digital Guides gives an unrivaled insight into WARNO’s conventional World War III as terrifyingly unleashed in 1989. Get reading with two separate e-books containing almost 200 pages of designer notes, background lore, division descriptions, gameplay tips, battle and campaign overviews, recommended books, and much more.

  • 2 e-books with almost 200 pages in total! - WARNO's Timeline and Designer's Notes respectively on Army General, Operations plus an in-depth Divisions overview.

    • WARNO's Timeline goes deep into “how it came to pass,” painting a frighteningly authentic picture of World War III erupting at the end stages of the Cold War.
    • Army General gives not only detailed insights into WARNO’s 5 Army General campaigns but also how the designers set out to create them. A great sneak peek into WARNO’s development, from the covert opening shots at Kassel to the ferocious battles in the Fulda Gap to the do-or-die actions at the gates of Frankfurt.
    • Operations give an in-depth view of Operations, how they were designed, and how they are best played! The scripted scenarios on noteworthy battles in WARNO’s World War III scenario shine in a new light, from the Soviet deception in the Kitzingen Ruse to the historical inspiration of the American-led Backhand Blow!
    • Divisions. An exhaustive list of all WARNO divisions, including historical tidbits, arsenal and unit descriptions, advantages and disadvantages, and how to best deploy each battlegroup’s armed forces.

legal_notice: Developed and published by Eugen Systems.
name: WARNO - Digital Guides

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Digital Guides give an unrivaled insight into WARNO’s conventional World War III as terrifyingly unleashed in 1989. Two e-books with close to 200 pages contain designer notes, background lore, division descriptions, gameplay tips, recommended books, and much more.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
